title: 3rd Conditional
instructions: Work with a partner, using one shared phone. Click on the "Start" button first and on the active squares after that.
cards: If I'd known he was going to be at the party, ...
I wouldn't have found out he was ill if ...
If the sea hadn't been so cold, ...
We would have picked you up at the airport if ...
If the taxi had come on time, ...
I wouldn't have bought a laptop computer if ...
If we had had more time in London, ...
I would have taken some photos if ...
Jack and Anna wouldn't have broken up if ...
If you'd told me my music was bothering you, ...
I wouldn't have worn jeans if ...
If he hadn't been the boss's son, ...
We wouldn't have run out of money if ...
I would have bought you a present if ...
If the traffic hadn't been so bad ...
I would have helped you if ...
If you had told me you don't like opera ...
